snippet: A Texas county judge said Justice Antonin Scalia’s doctor told her that he had had heart trouble and high blood pressure, and was too weak for surgery on a shoulder injury.
abstract: Presidio County, Tex, Judge Cinderela Guevara, who deemed autopsy unnecessary in death of Justice Antonin Scalia and concluded he died of natural causes, discloses that he had history of heart trouble and high blood pressure.
lead_paragraph: A Texas county judge said Justice Antonin Scalia’s doctor told her that he had had heart trouble and high blood pressure, and was too weak for surgery on a shoulder injury.

headline.main: Health History of Scalia Is Called Poor
headline.print_headline: Health History of Scalia Is Called Poor
